title: Modern serif
content: Hello world of type and type fonicators! I need some help with finding a modern, architectural looking serif font. Any suggestions?
author: zigavoo

comments.content:
What kind of architecture?

[Rotis](http://web.archive.org/web/20100821115923/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=Rotis) was designed by an architect, but it is generally frowned upon by type designers  
 [Remontoire](http://web.archive.org/web/20100821115923/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/psyops/remontoire_set_ot/)  
 [Nexus Mix](http://web.archive.org/web/20100821115923/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/fontfont/ff_nexus_mix_ot/)  
 [Melior](http://web.archive.org/web/20100821115923/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/linotype/melior_virtual/)  
 [Alinea Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20100821115923/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/presence_typo/alinea_serif/)
thanks, that helped out a lot
